entries.final_fail: You have failed the Mellichae encounter, you will be given the oppertunity to attempt it again in the near future.
entries.final_complete: Congratulations, you have completed the Force sensitive quests! You are now qualified to begin the Jedi Padawan Trials.
entries.leave: Well it appears you are busy,  I will return later.
entries.old_man_exit: Very well then %TT,  I shall return another time!
entries.old_man_greeting: %TT.  It is good to see you again.  I have some urgent news to share with you!
entries.taunt3: %TT, You may have destroyed my power crystals, but now I will destroy you!  SOLDIERS ATTACK!!!
entries.taunt2: This cannot be! Soldiers protect Mellichae immediately!
entries.taunt1: %TT, You shall pay for your tresspass here - SOLDIERS - defend the crystals! Let no one leave here alive.
